name: Michael Jimenez
text: It's no longer round table pizza.  It's another $3.99 pizza location. I love this place. It's family owned and operated. They're expanding but are still small enough to have the owners greet and treat you like family. They appreciate your …More

name: Susie HRTsAFyre
text: This place is no longer a Round Table Pizza. It is now a $3.99 pizza store. I have never tried the new chain, so it would be unfair to give it higher or lower than a three star rating. I can change this review once Google updates the name of the new business at this location and I try the new pizza place.

name: Glen Soares
text: I believe this location is now a 3.99 Pizza Co. As of a few days ago. Saw banner over original signage when banking next door.

name: Heather Selene Piedra
text: Favorite place to eat for dinner. I love there pizza and the owners make it the best way. Original crust, light sauce, pepperoni and well done is the best to go!!

name: Manuel Almeida
text: Very difficult to find a round table pizza parlor, most are gone, so my family and I went out of way to locate the restaurant. I'm glad we did. The pizza is still hand made and the place was Surprisingly clean. No detectable odors. I do not …More

name: Paulette De Vera
text: My family really likes there pizza. Very nice people that own it

name: Masterfro 710
text: Been ordering here for over 10 years, food is great, they had some issues with delivery but fixed it fast, and eating there is nice also, salad bar needs improving but for the small place its great. No bad odor at all fyi.

name: JOHN BRAND
text: Staff is extremely friendly,  and professional.  Food is excellent and hot. Always enjoy eating here.

name: Silvia Magana
text: We went after a softball tournament.  We didn't have to wait too long for our food for a group of 20. Great service and good food.

name: Jackie
text: Could use a little remodel. And the owners should really hire more help as they run the front and back. Restrooms ar very outdated. Other than that we always have friendly service.

name: Sean Horsley
text: Was a very good pizza ,no longer in business as of 01/11/19 the next nearest one is up off of grand and foothill(old foothill if your from the area) in the  Vons shopping center. Same phone number tho :-). Hope this helped at least one person.

name: Russ Lemley
text: Nice and quiet lunch. Great ham club

name: Leti Astorga
text: We got a veggie and a king Arthur pizza with wings. It wasnt as great as we expected especially for the prize. It was empty when we got there a few came and went n by the time we left it was empty again. To top it off we didnt feel welcome

name: Lukas Czarnota
text: Great place to have a party or just have a pizza with family. Also, BEST PIZZA EVER.

name: Ray Guinn
text: Great place....but it's gone now! Retirement I believe.

name: Michael
text: The pizza is expensive and the service is not great. You can find better tasting pizza and cheaper somewhere else.

name: Luis Castro
text: Good pizza but pricey.

name: Evan Yeet
text: Very Very Very Very Very Very Very Very VeryVery Very Very Very Very Very Very Very VeryVery Very Very Very Very Very Very Very VeryVery Very Very Very Very Very Very Very VeryVery Very Very Very Very Very Very Very VeryVery Very Very Very Very Very Very Very Very Good pizzas Maui Zaui is best.

name: Jesus Santana
text: Really good pizza and surprisingly really good hot wings

name: Belen Ramos
text: Great great service and great food.

name: Pete Armas
text: First I'd like to say, I love Round Table Pizza. I worked at one for three years very recently, so I understand the business. I went in at lunch time. Totally felt like a morgue. I'm sorry, I should say a morgue is much more lively. No …More

name: M Hendricks
text: The food was great the price is a little high

name: JESSE SOSA
text: Love the Pizza here they still make it handmade like the original Round table.

name: FJ CONSTRUCTION
text: Great pizza, wings, and cheese twisters. Bit overpriced..

name: eric smith
text: Service and owners are horrible. They put very few pepperonies on our pizza cuz they are cheap. Asked for Parmesan cheese and had to pay extra. The round table on foothill is 100x better

name: matthew carnes
text: Expensive but the designer pizzas are the best, love this place.

name: Alyha Valdez
text: It’s was great pizza

name: michael walsh
text: This place is dark and sad. They dont put much effort into the food here and its not to Round Table standards

name: George Lopez
text: Very good service and fast

name: Steve Peura
text: Great place to eat in glendora

name: Eddie Buster-Hyman
text: Not as good as I remembered

name: Wade Hall
text: Ok

name: Richard Ybarra SR
text: No longer round table

name: Robert Martorano
text: Not that good of a pizza ☹️

name: Brian Childers
text: Always the best

name: David Rose
text: Good pizza

name: bernie schonder
text: Great pizza

name: Nate Garzon
text: food is whatever, place has little fruit fly problem

name: Matt Black
text: Louis and his wife are the best

name: Cleo Mondragon
text: Always a good pizza choice here
